snippet.title: PC Engine Longplay [280] Parodius Da! ~Shinwa kara Owarai e~ (JP)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: KAGE-008

This port removes the Ice Cave and Moai Battleship levels probably due to the console's limitations, and features a Special mode that's similar to the Omake mode in SNES version, though the final boss you encounter is dependent on the final score.

00:00:09 -- Intro
00:01:39 -- Vic Viper playthrough
00:27:44 -- Octopus playthrough
00:53:32 -- TwinBee playthrough
01:20:31 -- Pentarou playthrough

Special Mode:
01:47:38 -- Over 1 million points run (Emperor Penguin boss)
01:54:05 -- Less than 30K points run (Green Cloak boss)
02:00:19 -- Between 900K and 1M points run (King Manjiri-kun boss)

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
